name: PivotalTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask Pivotal Tracker what is new”
”ask Pivotal Tracker to tell me my notifications”
”ask Pivotal Tracker to read my five last notifications”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pivotal tracker
des:
To link your account to this skill you need to head to https://www.pivotaltracker.com/profile and copy your API Token and copy in the linking page field. Do not worry, the API token will be kept by Amazon Alexa service servers and not in the skill server. That is needed because Pivotal Tracker doesn't have its own auth linking flow.

Have a quick briefing about your PivotalTracker activities.
